comment: Overall, I really liked having him as a professor. I can tell he enjoys teaching and has a passion for what he does. However, there are times when he can be unfair. If you miss class, you will receive a 0 for an assignment even if you already presented. This was really frustrating but overall he's a fun and passionate teacher.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: This class was great! It really helped me become comfortable speaking in public. His tests are online and they are difficult but you can get an A on them if you actually try. Everything else is very easy. Even if you think your speech is terrible you may be surprised of your grade. Great teacher and super fun class. Definitely take him.
He is great. Tests are online but little harder as you go by.  Just remember you have to speak in this class, just be prepared. He help you and encourages you but its an own effort too.

Great Professor. DO NOT BE LATE TO CLASS!!! He locks the door and you will get a ZERO for your speech. He respects students who act like responsible adults. His class is really a no brainer. Show up, be on time, listen to instructions, and do your work and you will get an A!
Probably the most helpful professor I have had.  Takes the time to meet with us one on one.  He is laid back but very serious.  Makes the class interesting and interactive.

The midterm and final were open book and open notes, but worded very trickily and riddled with typos. And even when students showed that they had the right answer he still counted it wrong for being in singular instead of plural form. Overall not too hard if you do the work and go to class, but good luck with the online tests.

About five graded speeches, not that hard, you get to choose the topics. Midterm was weird, make sure you go by his notes and not the book. His D2L could be a little more organized. Very strict but he's fair 80% of the time. One group speech at the end of the term.

He is a good teacher. Fair, reasonable. You don't have to write a lot, but you will be giving speaches, including the first day. Overall, easy class as long as you put forth the effort, great teacher.

Professor Boyer is one of the fairest professors I have had at KSU. Treats you as if you are an employee in the field. Uses real life activities and assignments to facilitate learning. Show him respect and he will show you the same. Don't be late and show up to every class. I would take another course with him in a heartbeat.

a fair teacher that has high expectations for his student's individuality. he treats you as an adult in a working enviornment. show him the respect you would show a boss. if not, he will have a bias against you. ten minutes early is on time, don't be late. also, don't give him bs, be respectful, and take responsibility for actions.
He really rewards you if he can tell you're trying. The class is kinda fun. Be a group leader... you don't really do anything. Easy 50 pts. He's straight forward, but not mean. DO NOTTTTT BE LATE.

I was new to the Kennesaw area and my first year in college, and was late a few times in the beginning, and then on time for the remaining classes and never skipped class, and always attentive, and got high grades on my speeches, but i highly recommend BE ON TIME! 30 SECONDS LATE DOESN'T MATTER! :(
He was a fair teacher. Just don't be late. Seriously, I showed up 30 seconds late and he had the door locked. Just do the work, show up, talk loud and wont have any problems.

This teacher is fair. All he wants from you is this: show up, do your work, be respectful. I liked him, personally. Don't bother with the text, I never opened it once. You can't skip class and expect to do well in this course, and it is a good amount of work, but that's true of any public speaking class. Take him.
THE BEST!! LOVED him!!!! he was understanding and considerate. attendance is mandatory but if you have a legit reason he understands but being late makes him really mad!

I don't know why the person below mesaid attendace is NOT mandatory it is COMPLETELY mandaory and he locks the door if you ar even a minute late. His grading scale makes no sense, and no matter ho hard I tried, I could not get an A. I would not take him ever again if I could help it

AMAZING!!! the nicest professor ive ever had. He loves what he does. Just do the work and it is not hard. There was only 4 or 5 quizzes all online so you can use your book. Midterm and final online. Great Great Great! TAKE HIM! Best teacher ever... very understanding and helpful!! not too strict on attendance. great teacher

Do not underestimate this class. Attendance mandatory.  Weekly quizzes with the book. His words/definitions always override the book.  He is nice but gets pissed off alot and you shouldnt bother him then. Straightforward professor. Gives a bunch of homework. I did my work, got an A. Be on time or youll get a 0.
GREAT PROFESSOR!!  Little homework, just online quizzes every week, that come from the powerpoints that he puts online... helps you overcome any fear from speaking in public.  TAKE HIS CLASS!!!!

DO NOT TAKE HIM!! I learned nothing in this class but its a waste of time. We watched movies and did useless group projects or nothing all the time. No class structure. Doesn't Follow the syllabus. Tests are ridiculously hard for the information (or lack there of) that we cover in class. Very unfair, makes up rules as he goes along.
